short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save pictures from the web or your computer as your phone wallpapers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pix2Fone is a free extension for Google Chrome combined with online service. It adds "Save image as phone wallpaper" option to the browser and lets you save any picture from the web (or your computer) as your mobile phone wallpapers. You can download phone wallpapers with the phone browser or send text message (SMS) bookmark directly to your phone.
